title: Data lost of changes are performed in two sessions
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
This is not a new issue, it is present in v1.76.20, but still persists in v1.78.2 in both cases tested on Windows 11.

1. Open first session and at e.g. SSH session change Hostname/IP
2. Open second session and change the same setting to some different Hostname or IP.
3. Close down second session.
4. Close down first session.
5. Open mRemoteNG and I get data from step 2, but lost data from step 1.

This issue can quickly get problematic if in first session data for one host is changed and in sec...

comments.snippet:
Just thinking little bit more... Maybe two session issue appears, because in mRemoteNG it is not possible to move tab to new window, just like in Firefox:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/89898c0a-3edb-40e0-bd7a-97aad16c330f)

If move tab to new window is possible, then there is no reason to allow two mRemoteNG sessions in the first place and avoid whole two session locking complexity.
